name: hosiery
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a word used especially in shops for things such as socks, tights, and stockings: Hosiery is on the second floor, Madam. Pregnant women can also buy special maternity hosiery. Synonym
hose
More examplesFewer examplesNot having bought tights before it took me a few minutes to find the hosiery section.During World War I, hosiery was rationed by the government because silk was needed for parachutes.The student nurses stood out, covered head to toe in white: caps, uniforms, hosiery, shoes.
